name: Remoku
tagline: Remoku is a web app for Roku remote control.  Written in JS/HTML5/CSS3
body:
remoku
======

Remoku is a web app for Roku remote control.  Written in JS/HTML5/CSS3

Visit http://help.remoku.tv to get started using Remoku.
